Canton.Canton City School District:
The Canton City School District is a public school district serving students in Canton, Ohio, The school district enrolls 9,087 students as of the 2014-2015 academic year.


== Features ==

The school district has a student television station carried on cable television channel 11, "TV11" from McKinley Senior High School's Downtown Campus.
The Canton City School District is a member of the Ohio 8, a strategic alliance composed of the superintendents and teacher union presidents from Ohio’s eight urban school districts.
